title: July GameDev Social!
description:
Come chat with fellow creators about making, playing, and admiring games! Talk about your game ideas and get inspired! Make friends and find collaborators. 

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307236091
location: Dirty 20 Bar - 14051 Manchester Rd - Ballwin, MO, us

title: Making Narrative Games with Twine- Kelsey Watkins
description:
Kelsey Watkins will be leading a class on Making Narrative Games with Twine on July 15th at 6:00pm. Learn how to use Twine to create games where players choose what happens next - no coding experience required!

This is part of a series of educational events leading up to the St. Louis Public Library’s Summer Library Game Jam on July 26th!
location: St. Louis Public Library - Central Library, 1301 Olive St, St. Louis, MO 63103, USA

title: Art Principles for Games- Brendan Steppig
description:
Looloopaa will be teaching a class on Art Principles for Games on July 16th at 6:00pm! Learn about color, shape, composition, and how to create characters and environments that bring your game world to life!

This is part of a series of educational events leading up to the St. Louis Public Library’s Summer Library Game Jam on July 26th!
location: St. Louis Public Library - Central Library, 1301 Olive St, St. Louis, MO 63103, USA

title: Simple Audio Tools for Games- Lazarus Richardson
description:
Lazarus D. Richardson will be demonstrating Simple Audio Tools for Games on July 24th at 6:00pm. Learn how to create sound effects and music that bring games to life!

This is part of a series of educational events leading up to the St. Louis Public Library’s Summer Library Game Jam on July 26th!
location: St. Louis Public Library - Central Library, 1301 Olive St, St. Louis, MO 63103, USA

title: SLPL Game Jam
description:
St. Louis Public Library’s Summer Library Game Jam will take place on July 26th for a quick one day game jam starting at 10:00am, with a showcase on the 27th starting at 2:00PM! 

Check our Upcoming Events for a series of Educational talks leading up to this event!

Held in the Creative Experience Lab
location: St. Louis Public Library - Central Library, 1301 Olive St, St. Louis, MO 63103, USA

title: MoGameCon 2025
description: Missouri's largest video game convention has invited STLGameDev to demo games made by members of our community all day long!  If you have a game you'd like us to demo for you, fill out our submission form!
location: Greensfelder Recreation Complex, 550 Weidman Rd, Manchester, MO 63011, USA

title: SLPL Game Jam Showcase
description:
Attendees of the SLPL Game Jam can show off the games that they made!

Held in the Creative Experience Lab
location: St. Louis Public Library - Central Library, 1301 Olive St, St. Louis, MO 63103, USA

title: July Game Club
description:
Game Club is like a book club except we pick a game to play each month and then meet up to discuss it with a focus on game design. 

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/308786221
location: Qdoba (Creve Coeur) - 766 N New Ballas Rd - Creve Coeur, MO, us
